instructions_to_main_agent: FONT: Add 'Rajdhani' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
THEME: Force Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for all entrance animations (FadeIn, SlideUp).
INTERACTION: All buttons must have a hover state (scale 1.05, glow intensity increase).
CRITICAL: Do not use generic 'Bootstrap' layouts. Use the Bento Grid for services.
SAGE CERTIFICATION: Highlight this prominently. It is the USP.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered text without hierarchy.
Never use pure black (#000000) - use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
Text contrast must be high (WCAG AA).
Interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
